present.spanish: Hablo español con mis compañeros de trabajo.
present.english: I speak Spanish with my coworkers.
present.subject: yo

present.spanish: Hablas muy bien inglés para ser principiante.
present.english: You speak English very well for a beginner.
present.subject: tú

present.spanish: Hablás como un verdadero porteño.
present.english: You speak like a true Buenos Aires native.
present.subject: vos

present.spanish: Habla por teléfono con su madre todos los días.
present.english: He/She talks on the phone with his/her mother every day.

present.spanish: Hablamos de nuestros planes para el futuro.
present.english: We talk about our plans for the future.
present.subject: nosotros

present.spanish: Habláis demasiado rápido para los estudiantes.
present.english: You all speak too fast for the students.

present.spanish: Hablan en voz baja durante la película.
present.english: They speak in low voices during the movie.

preterite.spanish: Hablé con el director sobre mi proyecto.
preterite.english: I spoke with the director about my project.

preterite.english: You spoke with great passion about the topic.
